modName: Billboards for Aspens to Cherry Blossoms
summary: Billboards for the mod Aspens to Cherry Blossoms by HiltsBrandon, for use with DynDOLOD and TES5LODGen
descriptionHtml:
Billboards are for use with HiltsBrandon's amazing mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29398/?]Aspens to Cherry Blossoms[/url] (required!!)  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59721/?]DynDOLOD[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62698/?]TES5LODGen[/url] is also required in order to generate your tree lod.  

These billboards will be very useful for mixing in the cherry blossoms with other mods and flora overhauls




[size=4]Currently billboards for the [u]lighter version[/u] of the cherry blossoms mod are available[/size].  

Darker billboards will be out ASAP


Change Log:

v1: released lighter version

v1.1: correctly re-labeled folders


These billboards were made using Zilav's billboards generator, nifskope, and photoshop.

credits and thanks
Zilav for the billboard generator
HiltsBrandon for Aspens to Cherry Blossoms
Zilav and Sheson for their amazing work with DynDOLOD and TES5LODGen
author: mobiusbelmont

files.name: Billboards for Aspens to Cherry Blossoms - Lighter Version
